name: Space war 3D (gameboy color)
description:
a mode 7 style game for the gameboy color. An on-rails shooter in which you control a ship, moving back and forth to dodge enemies. It features A horizontally and vertically scaling background on a console which has no such thing, running at... Sometimes 60 frames per second (lowest it gets is 30), but at least the framerate isn't as bad as any early 3D amiga game.

github source code available in case you want to improve the framerate or something
